content: in november 2022 a notary performed duties for a company called the company is seeking a divorce by mutual consent the couple has agreed on the terms of their separation including the division of assets arrangements for their child and waiving spousal maintenance they have also agreed on property agreements outstanding debts and settlement of assets the document includes provisions regarding costs jurisdiction and dispute resolution the couple grants a power of attorney to the notary for taxrelated matters the document exempts the general administration patrimonial documentation from registration the parties acknowledge the impact on maintenance and benefits the notary confirms the parties identity and certifies the information provided the parties acknowledge conflicts of interest and their rights and obligations a copy of the deed will be stored digitally and the parties can request a paper copy the notary read and explained the entire deed to the parties who have all signed it
